title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 44.10 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 44.10 - Purpose

State Regulations

Pursuant to Public Health Law, section 611, the New York State Department of Health (NYSDH) is authorized to pay State aid for approved vector surveillance and control programs. These rules and regulations are promulgated to define the conditions under which the NYSDH will approve vector surveillance and control activities for State aid. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
44.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
